testcase.name: Posts API POST /api/orders/create create a new order
Posts API GET /api/orders/findAll should retrieve all orders
Posts API Get /api/orders/findOne should return 1 exact order
Posts API PUT /api/orders/:orderId Should update the order price
OrderItems API POST /api/orderItems/create create a new order item
OrderItems API GET /api/orderItems/findAll should retrieve all order items
OrderItems API GET /api/orderItems/find/orderitemId should retrieve all order items with the same orderid
testcase.classname: should retrieve all order items with the same orderid
